article_node.title: 1 Green Flag for Boeing Stock Right Now
article_node.summary: Boeing’s new CEO Kelly Ortberg has made tangible progress, boosting 737 MAX production to 38 units per month and targeting 42 soon, which should lift margins and cash flow. The defense arm, Boeing Defense, Space & Security, has returned to profitability after a leadership change, with steady cost control and solid fixed‑price program performance. With a $619 billion backlog and improved execution, Boeing is positioned for stronger earnings growth in the near term.
